Edit.Name: prpVegaDemoW
Edit.Caption: TE vario
Edit.Help: This produces a fake TE vario gross vertical velocity. It can be used when in circling mode to demonstrate the lift tones. When not in circling mode, set this to a realistic negative value so speed command tones are produced.

Edit.Name: prpVegaDemoV
Edit.Caption: Airspeed
Edit.Help: This produces a fake airspeed. It can be used when not in circling mode to demonstrate the speed command tones.

Edit.Name: prpVegaDemoAudioClimb
Edit.Caption: Circling
Edit.Help: This forces the variometer into circling or cruise mode
